gates.description: Here's what's new in Summer '21. See the documentation for instructions on setting up these features, and then activate the release.
gates.dueDateInfoText: On this date, we activate the current release on all sandboxes that are still on the previous release.

features.description: We've redesigned the Advisee Snapshot. If desired, customize it to show up to four counters, upload advisee photos, and add the Snapshot to other Case pages.
features.helpLinkLabel: Set Up the Advisee Snapshot and Contact Details
features.label: Flexible Advisee Snapshot
features.name: FlexibleAdviseeSnapshot

features.description: Student Success Hub customers also enjoy the redesigned Student Snapshot. Configure the counters to show data relevant to K-12 schools, including Alerts and Success Plans, and, if desired, upload student photos and add the Snapshot to other Case pages.
features.helpLinkLabel: Set Up the Student Snapshot and Student Details
features.label: Flexible Student Snapshot
features.name: FlexibleStudentSnapshot

features.description: Front desk staff can now schedule individual appointments between advisors or members of an Advising Pool and an advisee. To set up front desk scheduling, create a profile with the necessary permissions for those users, and add the Appointment Scheduler component to a Lightning page so they can access the front desk New Appointment form.
features.helpLinkLabel: Set Up Front Desk Appointment Scheduling
features.label: Front Desk Appointment Scheduling
features.name: FrontDeskAppointmentScheduling

gates.label: Summer '21
gates.name: summer21

gates.description: Spring '21 is now activated for all orgs
gates.dueDateInfoText: On this date, we activate the current release on all sandboxes that are still on the previous release.

features.description: Flexible scheduling is activated in all orgs. If you haven't already done so, configure location- and topic-based advising availability for your users.
features.label: Flex Scheduling
features.name: flexscheduling

features.description: Group availability allows advisees to reserve a spot in a group advising appointment. Even if you're not using group availability yet, be sure you've set up permissions on the Attendee Limit and Discoverable fields.
features.label: Group Availability
features.name: groupavailability

gates.label: Spring '21
gates.name: spring21
